posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
The epitome of strength-based, fist-fighting, dragon-blooded Monks is here and delivers a terrible punishment to his opponents with his devastating punches.

Devastating Critical comes at lvl 24 in this build and there is no stop to the carnage that follows!

The inspiration of this build comes from the excellent Order of the Wyrm by Empyre.



ONE PUNCH MAN (Monk 25/ Sorcerer 1/ RDD 14)

RACE: Half – Orc
ALIGNMENT: LN (Smite Proof)
PLAYABILITY: PvM 1 – 40

STARTING/ ENDING STATS:
STR –  20 (42)
DEX –  14

Saving Throws (Fort/Ref/Will): 25/ 25/ 22 → 33/ 33/ 30 (saves Vs spells)
Naked/ Armoured AC: 31 (Clothes)
SR: 35 (Cannot be Reduced) 

BAB: 25 (Five attacks with fists/ Six attacks with flurry of blows)
AB: +45/ +42/ +39/ +36/ +33 (Fists)
DMG: 1D20 +16/ 19 – 20X2 (Fists) 

Devastating Critical DC: 46 (52) 
Stunning Fist/ Quivering Palm DC: 30 (35) 
Spellcasting: Full use of Sorcerer/ Wizard scrolls and wands
